lines.text: Is that the only reason you like me Leo? Because I don't step on your toes?
Hey bud, you sure you're going the shortest way?
Nope.
Why not?
Cus I gotta stay on the road.
Did anything happen to you overseas?
Nothing exciting. Just a war.
For months I've been wondering why I got married in the first place. Now I know it was the uniform.
You forget that I was in the uniform at the time.
Margaud's upset about something.
You don't say?
She very definitely has something on her mind.
If she has anything on her mind it's a step in the right direction.
Why don't you try to act like a gentleman and go away?
Where would you have me go?
I wish you'd ask me that question.
Don't bother about me, nobody's interested in what I'm doing.
Then why don't you stop doing it?

[to Peggy]
Y'know, if you had a bank roll and purple eyes, I'd ask you to be mine.
You must have some urgent plans.
That's a good guess.
Do they involve anyone I know?
Who do you know?
The best people.
My plans involve the best things about the best people.
Why don't you two pull knives on each other and get it over with?
A war marriage is as good as any other marriage - if it's to the right man.
If a lady asks you to jump on her bed, you'd better do it - she may not repeat the invitation!
Why should you want a girl like me? We were never *really* married.
You can't unbend the twig after the tree is full-grown.
I only listen at keyholes. I don't open private correspondence.
He didn't marry her for money. Only women are smart enough for that.
